articles.title: Anthropic CEO says AI company 'cannot in good conscience accede' to Pentagon's demands
articles.summary: Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei says AI company 'cannot in good conscience accede' to Pentagon's demands to allow wider use of its tech. articles.title: Microsoft’s Copilot Tasks AI uses its own computer to get things done
articles.summary: Microsoft is previewing a new AI system, Copilot Tasks, that it says is designed to take care of busywork for you in the background, the company announced on Thursday. articles.title: FanDuel parent Flutter reports disappointing fourth-quarter earnings
articles.summary: Flutter's 2026 revenue guidance of $17.75 billion to $19.05 billion was lower than analysts' projection.
